pages.text:
March 2020 County of Marin EMS BLS T4
TRAUMATIC EMERGENCIES-
IMPALED OBJECTS
Indications
• Patient with a traumatic impalement
BLS RMC
Spinal immobilization if indicated
• Control bleeding
• Prevent further injuries
Prepare for early and rapid transport to the appropriate facility
Supine or shock position
• Immobilize impaled object so internal end does
not move when patient is moved
• Dress wound without dislodging object
• Prioritize and treat life threatening injuries
• Anticipate rapid deterioration
SPECIAL CONSIDERATION
• Patients meeting anatomic, physiologic, high
energy transfer, and other mechanism of injury
on the Marin County Trauma Triage Tool
should be transported with ALS level of care
